items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a positive start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates:  The Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 chalked up record closing highs on Friday, with the Nasdaq also in positive territory, as markets were boosted by an earnings-driven jump in Netflix shares and broader gains across technology stocks.

items.title: HDFC Bank Q2 results impresses Street, brokerages forecast up to 28% upside on falling CD ratio
items.description: The consensus view is that the bank is on a stable path to address post-merger challenges as NII, profit metrics grow and credit to deposit ratio drops

items.title: Garden Reach shares in focus on LoI worth Rs 491 crore from Ministry Of Defence
items.description: Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Share Price | The contract involves the design, development, construction, integration of equipment, testing, certification, and commissioning of an Acoustic Research Ship (ARS).

items.title: Tata Consumer: Mixed bag in Q2; inorganic growth to unlock value
items.description: Weakness in beverages segment offsets growth in foods; international business fares well

items.title: Live: Nifty Poised For Further Recovery After Fridayâ€™s Bounce?HDFC, Kotak Bank In Focus|Opening Bell
items.description: Indian equity market snapped a three-day weakness with the Nifty clocking a triple-digit upmove and closing above the 24,800 mark. Axis Bank, Wipro, Eicher Motors, ICICI Bank, Shriram Finance were among the top gainers on the Nifty, while losers included Infosys, Britannia Industries, Nestle India, HUL and Asian Paints. Among sectors, bank and metal rose more than 1 percent each, while IT index was down more than 1 percent and FMCG index was down 0.5 percent. BSE smallcap indices ended in the red, while Midcap index ended marginally higher. Markets, however, saw weekly losses for 3rd straight week, longest losing streak of 2024. This morning global cues are mixed to positive with the GIFT Nifty signalling a positive start. Investors will digest big bank earnings â€“ HDFC Bank & Kotak Bank and Tech Mahindra and Tata Consumer as well. Waaree Energies IPO also opens for subscription today. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Kunal Rambhiaâ€”Fund Manager, The Streets and Aditya Sood, Fund Manager, InCred Asset Management.
